snippet.title: [Trailer] Sonic Revert - Online multiplayer fan game
snippet.description:
An online multiplayer Sonic fan game where Sonic R meets Trackmania!

Play: https://taldius.itch.io/sonic

Sonic Revert is a reimagining of the Sonic gameplay but where Sonic is controlled like a car when he's in running mode. The game features singleplayer time attack and online multiplayer racing mode. Some of the classic Sonic mechanics have been modified, such as the homing attack. The level design is inspired by Trackmania tracks, but filled with badniks, spikes and other dangers.

Music by Aurélien Montero: https://twitter.com/Aurelienmontero
